verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> you the Lord <WH3050>. Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH376> that fears <WH3372> the Lord <WH3068>, that delights <WH2654> greatly <WH3966> in his commandments <WH4687>.
His seed <WH2233> shall be mighty <WH1368> upon earth <WH776>: the generation <WH1755> of the upright <WH3477> shall be blessed <WH1288>.
Wealth <WH1952> and riches <WH6239> shall be in his house <WH1004>: and his righteousness <WH6666> endures <WH5975> for ever <WH5703>.
Unto the upright <WH3477> there arises <WH2224> light <WH216> in the darkness <WH2822>: he is gracious <WH2587>, and full of compassion <WH7349>, and righteous <WH6662>.
A good <WH2896> man <WH376> shows favor <WH2603>, and lends <WH3867>: he will guide <WH3557> his affairs <WH1697> with discretion <WH4941>.
Surely he shall not be moved <WH4131> for ever <WH5769>: the righteous <WH6662> shall be in everlasting <WH5769> memory <WH2143>.
He shall not be afraid <WH3372> of evil <WH7451> news <WH8052>: his heart <WH3820> is fixed <WH3559>, trusting <WH982> in the Lord <WH3068>.
His heart <WH3820> is established <WH5564>, he shall not be afraid <WH3372>, until he see <WH7200> his desire upon his enemies <WH6862>.
He has dispersed <WH6340>, he has given <WH5414> to the poor <WH34>; his righteousness <WH6666> endures <WH5975> for ever <WH5703>; his horn <WH7161> shall be exalted <WH7311> with honor <WH3519>.

The wicked <WH7563> shall see <WH7200> it <WH3707>, and be grieved; he shall gnash <WH2786> with his teeth <WH8127>, and melt away <WH4549>: the desire <WH8378> of the wicked <WH7563> shall perish <WH6>.
